00058     UILayer::UILayer(const String& name, Gorilla::Layer* GLayer, Gorilla::Screen* GScreen)
00059         : Name(name),
00060           GorillaLayer(GLayer),
00061           Parent(GScreen)
00062     {
00063         Manager = World::GetWorldPointer()->GetUIManager();
00064     }
00065 
00066     UILayer::~UILayer()
00067     {
00068         while(!Buttons.empty())
00069         {
00070             UI::Button* button = Buttons.back();
00071             delete button;
00072             Buttons.pop_back();
00073         }
00074         while(!Rectangles.empty())
00075         {
00076             UI::Rectangle* rectangle = Rectangles.back();
00077             delete rectangle;
00078             Rectangles.pop_back();
00079         }
00080         while(!Captions.empty())
00081         {
00082             UI::Caption* caption = Captions.back();
00083             delete caption;
00084             Captions.pop_back();
00085         }
00086         while(!MarkupTexts.empty())
00087         {
00088             UI::MarkupText* markup = MarkupTexts.back();
00089             delete markup;
00090             MarkupTexts.pop_back();
00091         }
00092         while(!Widgets.empty())
00093         {
00094             UI::Widget* widget = Widgets.back();
00095             delete widget;
00096             Widgets.pop_back();
00097         }
00098         Parent->destroy(GorillaLayer);
00099     }

00140     UI::Button* UILayer::GetButton(String& Name)
00141     {
00142         for ( std::vector<UI::Button*>::iterator it = Buttons.begin() ; it != Buttons.end() ; it++ )
00143         {
00144             if ( Name == (*it)->GetName() )
00145             {
00146                 UI::Button* button = (*it);
00147                 return button;
00148             }
00149         }
00150         return 0;
00151     }
00152

00154     {
00155         return Buttons[Index];
00156     }

00159     {
00160         return Buttons.size();

00163     void UILayer::DestroyButton(UI::Button* ToBeDestroyed)
00164     {
00165         for ( std::vector<UI::Button*>::iterator it = Buttons.begin() ; it != Buttons.end() ; it++ )
00166         {
00167             if ( ToBeDestroyed == (*it) )
00168             {
00169                 delete ToBeDestroyed;
00170                 Buttons.erase(it);
00171             }
00172         }
00173     }

00311     void UILayer::DestroyWidget(UI::Widget* ToBeDestroyed)
00312     {
00313         for ( std::vector<UI::Widget*>::iterator it = Widgets.begin() ; it != Widgets.end() ; it++ )
00314         {
00315             if ( ToBeDestroyed == (*it) )
00316             {
00317                 Widgets.erase(it);
00318                 UI::Widget::WidgetType Type = ToBeDestroyed->GetType();
00319                 switch (Type)
00320                 {
00321                     case UI::Widget::Scrollbar:
00322                     {
00323                         UI::Scrollbar* Scroll = static_cast<UI::Scrollbar*> (ToBeDestroyed);
00324                         delete Scroll;
00325                     }
00326                     case UI::Widget::CheckBox:
00327                     {
00328                         UI::CheckBox* Check = static_cast<UI::CheckBox*> (ToBeDestroyed);
00329                         delete Check;
00330                     }
00331                     default:
00332                         return;
00333                 }
00334             }
00335         }
00336     }
00337 
00338     UI::Scrollbar* UILayer::CreateScrollbar(String& Name, Vector2 Position, Vector2 Size, UI::Scrollbar::BarStyle Style)
00339     {
00340         UI::Scrollbar* Scroll = new UI::Scrollbar(Name,Position,Size,Style,this);
00341         Widgets.push_back(Scroll);
00342         return Scroll;
00343     }
00344 
00345     UI::Button* UILayer::CheckButtonMouseIsOver()
00346     {
00347         if(Buttons.empty())
00348             return 0;
00349         UI::Button* button = NULL;
00350         for( std::vector<UI::Button*>::iterator it = Buttons.begin() ; it != Buttons.end() ; it++ )
00351         {
00352             button = (*it);
00353             if(button->CheckMouseHover())
00354             {
00355                 return button;
00356             }
00357         }
00358         return 0;
00359     }
00360 
00361     UI::Widget* UILayer::CheckWidgetMouseIsOver()
00362     {
00363         if(Widgets.empty())
00364             return 0;
00365         UI::Widget* widget = NULL;
00366         for( std::vector<UI::Widget*>::iterator it = Widgets.begin() ; it != Widgets.end() ; it++ )
00367         {
00368             widget = (*it);
00369             if(widget->CheckMouseHover())
00370             {
00371                 return widget;
00372             }
00373         }
00374         return 0;
00375     }
